name: ShapeCamp 32
description:
The Goal of the game is to give every shape what he lost. 

You can do this by remembering what the shap lost in an video thats play in the begining of every level. This video is only only played onces. So you need to remeber everything fast!

Challenges:

Make all your own sound effects using only sounds you can make with your mouth.
Only use the default MS Paint color palette.                                                                                     
Use only comic sans for any in-game font.                                                                                     
Draw your assets without a drawing tablet. (+ did it with a TouchPad).
Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.

made by: Poesbroek
